message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first because I believe you'd get a lot of value from it. I'm looking for $20,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $15,000. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go above $15,000. Would you consider meeting me at $16,000?
